h4.p: [22] etadaññāya medhāvī, taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇakanti {taṃ gaṇheyya apaṇṇakaṃ (ka0)}..
[21] akilāsuno ^a^V1.0002^ea^ vaṇṇupathe {vaṇṇapathe (ka0)} khaṇantā, udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avinduṃ.
[22] evaṃ munī vīriya {muni viriya (pī0), muni vīriya (syā0 ka0)} balūpapanno, akilāsu vinde hadayassa santinti..
[21] idha ^a^T1.0002^ea^ ^a^M1.0002^ea^ ce naṃ {idha ce hi naṃ (sī0 pī0)} virādhesi, saddhammassa niyāmataṃ {niyāmakaṃ (syā0 ka0)}.
[22] ciraṃ tvaṃ anutappesi {anutapessasi (sī0 pī0), anutappissasi (?)}, serivāyaṃva vāṇijoti..

[21] {kimagghatī taṇḍulanāḷikā ca, bārāṇasī antarabāhirāni. assapañcasate tāni, ekā taṇḍulanāḷikāti. (syā0)} kimagghati taṇḍulanāḷikāya, assāna mūlāya vadehi rāja {nāḷikā ca (sī0), nāḷikāya (ka0 sī0 aṭṭha0)}.
[22] bārāṇasiṃ santarabāhirato {bāhirantaṃ (sī0)}, ayamagghati taṇḍulanāḷikāti {kimagghatī vaṇḍulanāḷikā ca, bārāṇasī antarabāhirāni. assapañcasate tāni, ekā taṇḍulanāḷikāti. (syā0)}..
[21] putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja, tvaṃ maṃ posa janādhipa.
[22] aññepi devo poseti, kiñca {kiñci (ka0)} devo sakaṃ pajanti..
[21] yañca ^a^T1.0004^ea^ aññe na rakkhanti, yo ca aññe na rakkhati.
[22] sa ve rāja sukhaṃ seti, kāmesu anapekkhavāti..
[22] hiri puttavaruttagāmaṇinā, yo ca na rakkhati tena dasāti..
[22] nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi {sākhasmiṃ (sī0 pī0)} jīvitanti..
[22] te cāpi dhikkitā {dhikkatā (?)} sattā, ye itthīnaṃ vasaṃgatāti..
[21] na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo, āvāsehi va {vā (sabbattha)} santhavehi vā.
[22] vātamigaṃ gahananissitaṃ {gehanissitaṃ (sī0 pī0)}, vasamānesi rasehi sañjayoti..
[22] sattahi ^a^T1.0006^ea^ kālātikkantaṃ {sattahi kalāha'tikkantaṃ (sī0), sattakāleha'tikkantaṃ (syā0), sattahi kālāha'tikkantaṃ (pī0)}, na naṃ ovaditussaheti..
[21] migaṃ ^a^M1.0005^ea^ tipallattha {tipallatta (ka0)} manekamāyaṃ, aṭṭhakkhuraṃ aḍḍharattāpapāyiṃ {aḍḍharattāvapāyiṃ (sī0 pī0)}.
[22] ekena sotena chamāssasanto, chahi kalāhitibhoti {kalāhatibhoti (sī0 syā0 pī0)} bhāgineyyoti..
[21] kāḷe ^a^V1.0005^ea^ vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
[21] evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyuṃ, dukkhāyaṃ jātisambhavo.
[22] na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, pāṇaghātī hi socatīti..
[21] sace ^a^T1.0007^ea^ mucce {muñce (sī0 syā0 pī0)} pecca mucce {muñce (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, muccamāno hi bajjhati.
[22] na hevaṃ dhīrā muccanti, mutti bālassa bandhananti..
[22] naḷena vāriṃ pissāma {pivissāma (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, neva {na ca (ka0)} maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasīti..
[21] atha ^a^M1.0006^ea^ lakkhaṇa sākha dhiratthu puna, na kiratthi rasehi kharādiyā.
[22] atibhoti vara {rasa (sabbattha)} māluta pāṇa, muccena naḷāvhayanena bhavanti dasāti..
[21] ñātametaṃ ^a^V1.0006^ea^ kuruṅgassa, yaṃ tvaṃ sepaṇṇi siyyasi {seyyasi (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[22] aññaṃ ^a^T1.0008^ea^ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi, na me te ruccate phalanti..
[21] ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaddhā, koleyyakā vaṇṇabalūpapannā.
[22] teme na vajjhā mayamasma vajjhā, nāyaṃ saghaccā dubbalaghātikāyanti..
[22] seyyova vaḷavā gojo {bhojjo (sī0), bhojjho (syā0 pī0)}, yuñja maññeva sārathīti..
[21] yadā yadā yattha yadā, yattha yattha yadā yadā.
[22] ājañño kurute vegaṃ, hāyanti tattha vāḷavāti..
[22] susaññatānañhi vaco nisamma, gajuttamo sabbaguṇesu aṭṭhāti..
[21] nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātave, na ca piṇḍaṃ na kuse na ghaṃsituṃ.
[22] maññāmi abhiṇhadassanā, nāgo snehamakāsi {sinehamakāsi (sī0 syā0 pī0)} kukkureti..
[22] dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahūti..
[21] yato yato garu dhuraṃ, yato gambhīravattanī.
[22] tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhuranti..
[22] kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu pāṇaṃ, mā me dijā vikkulavā {māyime dijā vikulāvā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} ahesunti..
[21] rudaṃ manuññaṃ rucirā ca piṭṭhi, veḷuriyavaṇṇūpanibhā {vaṇṇūpaṭibhā (syā0), vaṇṇasannibhā (ka0)} ca gīvā.
[22] byāmamattāni ca pekhuṇāni, naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmīti..
[22] yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasanti..
[21] na ^a^T1.0012^ea^ maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ, na maṃ jālasmi bādhanaṃ.
[22] yañca maṃ maññate macchī, aññaṃ so ratiyā gatoti..
[21] santi ^a^V1.0009^ea^ pakkhā apatanā, santi pādā avañcanā.
[21] yaṃ nissitā jagatiruhaṃ vihaṅgamā, svāyaṃ aggiṃ pamuñcati.
[22] disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā {vaṅkaṅgā (syā0)}, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti..
[21] ye vuḍḍha {vaddha (sī0 pī0)} mapacāyanti, narā dhammassa kovidā.
[22] diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatīti..
[21] maññe ^a^M1.0010^ea^ sovaṇṇayo rāsi, soṇṇamālā ca nandako.
[22] yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni {thūlāni (ka0)} gajjatīti..
[21] sirimātali dhītara pakkhivaro, ratiyāgato mātāpitā ca puna.
[21] jagatīruha vuḍḍha sukakkaṭako, tathā nandakapiṇḍavarena dasāti..
[21] yo ^a^T1.0014^ea^ atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ.
[22] ajiyā pādamolamba {pādamolumba (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, mittako viya socatīti..
[21] yo ^a^M1.0011^ea^ atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ.

[22] evaṃ so nihato seti, veḷukassa yathā pitāti..
[21] seyyo ^a^T1.0015^ea^ ^a^V1.0011^ea^ amitto matiyā upeto, na tveva mitto mativippahīno.
[22] makasaṃ vadhissanti hi eḷamūgo, putto pitu abbhidā uttamaṅganti..
[22] passa rohiṇikaṃ jammiṃ, mātaraṃ hantvāna socatīti..
[22] hāpeti atthaṃ dummedho, kapi ārāmiko yathāti..
[22] hāpeti atthaṃ dummedho, koṇḍañño vāruṇiṃ yathāti..
[21] anupāyena ^a^T1.0016^ea^ yo atthaṃ, icchati so vihaññati.
[22] cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ {vedabbhaṃ (sī0 pī0)}, sabbe te byasanamajjhagūti..
[22] attho atthassa nakkhattaṃ, kiṃ karissanti tārakāti..
[22] idāni khohaṃ yajissāmi, bahu {bahū (sī0 pī0), bahuṃ (ka0)} adhammiko janoti..
[21] atha mittaka mātu kapotavaro, tathā veḷūka eḷamūgo rohiṇī.
[22] kapi ^a^T1.0017^ea^ vāruṇi cetacarā ca puna, tathā tāraka yaññavarena dasāti..
[21] āsīsetheva ^a^M1.0013^ea^ {āsiṃsetheva (sī0 syā0 pī0)} puriso, na nibbindeyya paṇḍito.
[22] passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahūti..
[21] tatheva ^a^V1.0013^ea^ puṇṇā pātiyo, aññāyaṃ vattate kathā.
[22] ākāraṇena {ākārakena (sī0 syā0 pī0)} jānāmi, na cāyaṃ bhaddikā surāti..
[21] nāyaṃ ^a^T1.0018^ea^ rukkho durāruho, napi gāmato ārakā.
[21] yassete caturo dhammā, vānarinda yathā tava.
[22] saccaṃ dhammo dhiti {dhitī (sī0 pī0)} cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatīti..
[21] yassete ^a^T1.0019^ea^ ^a^V1.0014^ea^ ca {yassa ete (sī0 pī0)} tayo dhammā, vānarinda yathā tava.
[22] dakkhiyaṃ sūriyaṃ paññā, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatīti..
[22] dhantena hi sataṃ laddhaṃ, atidhantena nāsitanti..
[22] dhantenādhigatā bhogā, te tāto vidhamī dhamanti..
[21] yathā ^a^M1.0015^ea^ icchiṃ tathāhudakā thalā, sura sāduphalo ca alīnamano.
[22] sampahaṭṭhamano ^a^T1.0020^ea^ caturo ca tayo, sataladdhaka bhogadhanena dasāti..
[21] asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati.
[27] sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā.
[22] aṇḍabhūtā bhatā bhariyā, tāsu ko jātu vissaseti..
[21] kodhanā akataññū ca, pisuṇā mittabhedikā {pisuṇā ca vibhedikā (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[22] brahmacariyaṃ cara bhikkhu, so sukhaṃ na vihāhasīti {pihāhisīti (sī0 syā0 pī0), vihāyasi (ka0)}..
[21] mā ^a^T1.0021^ea^ su nandi icchati maṃ, mā su soci na micchati {na icchati (sī0 syā0 pī0)}.
[21] yathā ^a^M1.0016^ea^ nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā.
[22] evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, nāsaṃ kujjhanti paṇḍitāti..
[21] ekā icchā pure āsi, aladdhā mudulakkhaṇaṃ.
[22] yato laddhā aḷārakkhī, icchā icchaṃ vijāyathāti..
[21] ucchaṅge deva me putto, pathe dhāvantiyā pati.
[22] tañca desaṃ na passāmi, yato sodariyamānayeti {sodariyaṃ naye (ka0)}..
[21] yasmiṃ ^a^T1.0022^ea^ ^a^V1.0016^ea^ mano nivisati, cittañcāpi {cittaṃ vāpi (katthaci)} pasīdati.
[21] dhiratthu taṃ visaṃ vantaṃ, yamahaṃ jīvitakāraṇā.
[22] vantaṃ paccāvamissāmi {paccāharissāmi (ka0)}, mataṃ me jīvitā varanti..
[21] na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati.
[22] taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyatīti..
[21] sikhīsabbaghasopi ^a^M1.0017^ea^ ca vīṇavaro, pisuṇā mittabhedikā nandī nadī.
[22] mudulakkhaṇa sodariyā ca mano, visa sādhujitena bhavanti dasāti..
[21] yo ^a^T1.0023^ea^ pubbe karaṇīyāni, pacchā so kātumicchati.
[22] varuṇakaṭṭha {varaṇakaṭṭha (sī0 pī0)} bhañjova, sa pacchā manutappatīti..
[22] sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ {paṭhaviṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} dajjā, neva naṃ abhirādhayeti..
[22] kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ {viplāvitaṃ (sī0 pī0)} seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naroti..
[21] sādhū sambahulā ñātī, api rukkhā araññajā.
[22] kākaṃ sokāya randhehi, mañca sokā pamocayāti..
[21] asaṅkiyomhi gāmamhi, araññe natthi me bhayaṃ.
[22] ujuṃ maggaṃ samārūḷho, mettāya karuṇāya cāti..
[21] usabhā ^a^V1.0018^ea^ rukkhā gāviyo gavā ca, asso kaṃso siṅgālī {sigāsī (sī0 syā0 pī0)} ca kumbho.
[22] pokkharaṇī ca apākacandanaṃ, lābūni sīdanti silā plavanti..
[21] maṇḍūkiyo kaṇhasappe gilanti, kākaṃ supaṇṇā parivārayanti.
[22] tasā ^a^T1.0025^ea^ vakā eḷakānaṃ bhayāhi, vipariyāso {vipariyāyo (syā0 ka0)} vattati nayidha matthīti..
[21] ubho khañjā ubho kuṇī, ubho visamacakkhukā {cakkhulā (sī0 pī0)}.
[22] ubhinnaṃ piḷakā {pīḷakā (syā0)} jātā, nāhaṃ passāmi illisanti..
[21] yato ^a^M1.0019^ea^ viluttā ca hatā ca gāvo, daḍḍhāni gehāni jano ca nīto.
[22] athāgamā puttahatāya putto, kharassaraṃ ḍiṇḍimaṃ {deṇḍimaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0), ḍindimaṃ (ka0)} vādayantoti..
[21] yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pure, atha te pūtisarā sajanti pacchā.
[22] ubhayaṃ ^a^T1.0026^ea^ na sameti bhīmasena, yuddhakathā ca idañca te vihaññanti..
[21] varuṇā akataññūvare tu saccavaraṃ, savanappatinā ca abhitthanaya.
[22] karuṇāya silāplava illisato, puna ḍiṇḍimapūtisarena dasāti..
[22] visaññikaraṇiṃ pitvā {pītvā (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, diṭṭhā nāhumha vānarāti..
[22] svāsi pāsāṇamāsīno, yasmā jīvaṃ na mokkhasīti..
[21] mitto have sattapadena hoti, sahāyo pana dvādasakena hoti.
[27] māsaḍḍhamāsena ca ñāti hoti, tatuttariṃ attasamopi hoti.
[22] sohaṃ kathaṃ attasukhassa hetu, cirasanthutaṃ {cirasandhavaṃ (ka0), cirasatthunaṃ (pī0)} kāḷakaṇṇiṃ jaheyyanti..
[21] ārogyamicche paramañca lābhaṃ, sīlañca vuddhānumataṃ sutañca.
[22] dhammānuvattī ca alīnatā ca, atthassa dvārā pamukhā chaḷeteti..
[21] āyatiṃ ^a^T1.0028^ea^ dosaṃ nāññāya, yo kāme paṭisevati.
[21] sīlaṃ ^a^V1.0020^ea^ kireva kalyāṇaṃ, sīlaṃ loke anuttaraṃ.
[22] passa ghoraviso nāgo, sīlavāti na haññatīti..
[21] yassa ^a^M1.0021^ea^ maṅgalā samūhatāse {samūhatā (sī0 syā0 pī0 su0 ni0 362}, uppātā {uppādā (pī0)} supinā ca lakkhaṇā ca.
[22] so {sa (sī0 pī0 ka0)} maṅgaladosavītivatto, yugayogādhigato na jātumetīti..
[21] kalyāṇimeva muñceyya, na hi muñceyya pāpikaṃ.
[22] mokkho kalyāṇiyā sādhu, mutvā tappati pāpikanti..
[21] vācāva ^a^T1.0029^ea^ kira te āsi, saṇhā sakhilabhāṇino.
[22] tiṇamatte asajjittho, no ca nikkhasataṃ haranti..
[21] apāyimha ca dūbhakaṃ sattapadaṃ, chaḷadvara ca āyatinā ca puna.
[22] ahisīlava maṅgali pāpikassā, sataṃnikkha katatthavarena dasāti..
[21] littaṃ ^a^V1.0021^ea^ ^a^M1.0022^ea^ paramena tejasā, gilamakkhaṃ ^a^T1.0030^ea^ puriso na bujjhati.
[22] gila re gila pāpadhuttaka, pacchā te kaṭukaṃ bhavissatīti..
[22] piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍitanti..
[21] na vissase avissatthe, vissatthepi na vissase.
[21] sotatto sosindo {sosīto (sī0 syā0 pī0), sosino (ka0)} ceva, eko bhiṃsanake vane.
[21] sādhu ^a^T1.0032^ea^ kho paṇḍito nāma, na tveva atipaṇḍito.
[22] atipaṇḍitena puttena, manamhi upakūḷitoti {upakūlitoti (sī0), upakuṭṭhitoti (syā0), upakuṭito (ka0)}..
[21] parosahassampi samāgatānaṃ, kandeyyuṃ te vassasataṃ apaññā.
[22] ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti atthanti..
[21] gilamakkhakutūhala ^a^T1.0033^ea^ ^a^V1.0023^ea^ mātukassā, muninā ca aniccata pattavaraṃ.
[21] parosataṃ ^a^M1.0024^ea^ cepi samāgatānaṃ, jhāyeyyuṃ te vassasataṃ apaññā.
[22] ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti atthanti..
[21] yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇaṃ, so me pitā dubbhi {dūbhi (sī0 pī0)} vane karoti.
[22] sā kassa kandāmi vanassa majjhe, yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ {sahasā (sī0 syā0 pī0)} karotīti..
[21] yattha ^a^T1.0034^ea^ verī nivisati {nivasati (sī0 ka0)}, na vase tattha paṇḍito.
[22] ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisūti..
[27] soḷasāhi ca bāttiṃsa {battiṃsa (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, atricchaṃ cakkamāsado.
[21] bahumpetaṃ ^a^V1.0024^ea^ ^a^M1.0025^ea^ vane kaṭṭhaṃ, vāto bhañjati dubbalaṃ.
[22] tassa ce bhāyasī nāga, kiso nūna bhavissasīti..
[21] sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantaṃ {sukhakaṃ vata jīvaṃ (ka0)}, pacamānā udañcanī.
[21] sādhu ^a^T1.0035^ea^ kho sippakaṃ nāma, api yādisa kīdisaṃ.
[21] sikkheyya sikkhitabbāni, santi tacchandino {sacchandino (sī0 pī0)} janā.
[22] bāhiyā hi {pi (sī0 syā0 pī0)} suhannena, rājānamabhirādhayīti..
[21] yathanno puriso hoti, tathannā tassa devatā.
[22] āharetaṃ kuṇḍapūvaṃ {kaṇaṃ pūvaṃ (sī0 pī0)}, mā me bhāgaṃ vināsayāti..
[21] saparosata tāyita verī ^a^T1.0036^ea^ puna, bhamacakkatha nāgasirivhayano.
[22] sukhakañca vata sippaka bāhiyā, kuṇḍapūva mahallikakā ca dasāti..
[21] haṃci {haṃsi (sī0 syā0), hañci (?)} tuvaṃ evamaññasi seyyo, puttena pitāti rājaseṭṭha.
[22] handassatarassa te ayaṃ, assatarassa hi gadrabho pitāti..
[21] yena sattubilaṅgā ca, diguṇapalāso ca pupphito.
[27] yena dadāmi {yenā'dāmi (sī0 syā0)} tena vadāmi, yena na dadāmi {yena nā'dāmi (sī0 syā0)} na tena vadāmi.
[22] esa ^a^T1.0037^ea^ maggo yavamajjhakassa, etaṃ channapathaṃ vijānāhīti..
[21] saddahāsi ^a^M1.0027^ea^ siṅgālassa {sigālassa (sī0 syā0 pī0)}, surāpītassa brāhmaṇa.
[22] sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, kuto kaṃsasatā duveti..
[22] sāyaṃ vipakkhikā seti, hatā cakkena sāsikāti {sālikāti (sī0 syā0 pī0)}..
[21] accuggatātilapatā {atibalatā (sī0 syā0 pī0), atilapakā (katthaci)}, ativelaṃ pabhāsitā.
[22] nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vā, abhijānāti kukkuṭoti..
[21] abaddhā ^a^T1.0039^ea^ ^a^V1.0027^ea^ tattha bajjhanti, yattha bālā pabhāsare.
[22] baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsareti..
[21] atha gadrabha sattuva kaṃsasataṃ, bahucinti sāsikāyātikara.
[21] kare sarikkho atha vāpi seṭṭho, nihīnako vāpi kareyya eko.
[22] kareyyumete {kareyyuṃ te (sī0 pī0)} byasane uttamatthaṃ, yathā ahaṃ kusanāḷi rucāyanti..
[21] yasaṃ ^a^T1.0040^ea^ ^a^M1.0029^ea^ laddhāna dummedho, anatthaṃ carati attano.
[22] nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na {na vedi (ka0)} naṅgalīsaṃ, dadhippayaṃ {dadhimpayaṃ (sī0 pī0)} maññati naṅgalīsanti..
